He Escapes Prison And Holds A Family Hostage | Full Survival Crime Movie | For Your Own Sake

Doug Freeman comes home expecting a family dinner with his wife and two daughters, but instead finds them joined by his best friend and a hired interventionist. Dougâ€™s intervention is interrupted by Beau, a fleeing, armed, escaped convict who holds everyone hostage in the family home while he waits for the police in the area to move on.

2021. Stars: Elyse Cantor, Lisa Goodman, Rob Moore
